```{r}
book_character <- c("brown bear", "red bird", "yellow duck", "blue horse")

for (i in 1:(length(book_character) - 1)) {
  print(paste(book_character[i], book_character[i], "what do you see?", "I see a", book_character[i+1], "looking at me"))
  
}
```
